data_table.description: Sample ID, analyte type, tumor status, body site where sample was collected, and histological type of samples obtained from participants with or without COPD and involved in in the "NHLBI GO-ESP: Lung Cohorts Exome Sequencing Project (COPDGene)" project.

variable.name: Body_site
variable.description: Body site where sample was collected

variable.name: Histological_Type
variable.description: Cell or tissue type or subtype of sample
